doc.title: Siang Hee Seafood: Coffee Crabs hit the heartlands!
doc.text: I/PRP have/VB been/VBN a/DT huge/NN fan/NN of/IN Siang/NNP Hee/NNP Seafood/NNP since/IN I/PRP first/RB blogged/VBD about/IN them/PRP in/IN 2008/CD ./. So/RB now/RB ,/, Coffee/JJ Crabs/NNS has/VB hit/VB the/DT heartlands/NN and/CC is/VBZ accessible/JJ to/TO more/JJR Singaporeans/NNS who/WP might/VB otherwise/RB have/VBN to/TO pay/VB $/$ 70/CD just/RB to/TO eat/VB Coffee/NN Crabs/NNS at/IN Majestic/NN Bay/NN ./.
